statements: SELECT * FROM genomic_data;
SELECT sample_id, chromosome, position FROM genomic_data WHERE chromosome = 'X';
SELECT experiment_id, sample_id, nucleotide FROM genomic_data WHERE sample_id = 25;
SELECT chromosome, position, nucleotide FROM genomic_data ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT * FROM genomic_data WHERE sample_id = 10 AND chromosome = 'Y';
SELECT * FROM genomic_data WHERE chromosome = 'X' ORDER BY position DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sample_id, COUNT(*) FROM genomic_data GROUP BY sample_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 100
SELECT DISTINCT chromosome FROM genomic_data
SELECT * FROM genomic_data ORDER BY chromosome, position ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT AVG(position), MIN(position), MAX(position) FROM genomic_data
SELECT * FROM Experiment;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM Experiment;
SELECT * FROM SequencingData;
SELECT sequencing_id, sequence_data, sequencing_date FROM SequencingData;
SELECT experiment_name, sequencing_date FROM Experiment INNER JOIN SequencingData ON Experiment.experiment_id = SequencingData.experiment_id;
SELECT * FROM Experiment WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM Experiment WHERE experiment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name, experiment_date FROM Experiment ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT e.experiment_name, s.sequence_data FROM Experiment e JOIN SequencingData s ON e.experiment_id = s.experiment_id;
SELECT * FROM Experiment WHERE experiment_name LIKE '%test%';
SELECT * FROM experiment_data;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, organism FROM sample_information WHERE organism='Human';
SELECT result_id, analysis_date, result_summary FROM analysis_results ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, sample_name, result_summary FROM experiment_data JOIN sample_information ON experiment_data.sample_id = sample_information.sample_id WHERE experiment_name='Experiment 1';
SELECT experiment_id, sample_id, sequencing_data FROM experiment_data WHERE experiment_id=3 AND sample_id=1;
SELECT * FROM experiment_data WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT experiment_name, sequencing_data FROM experiment_data WHERE experiment_id = 2;
SELECT sample_name, tissue_type, organism FROM sample_information WHERE sample_id = 1;
SELECT result_summary, analysis_date FROM analysis_results WHERE sample_id = 2;

SELECT experiment_name, sample_name, result_summary FROM experiment_data JOIN sample_information ON experiment_data.sample_id = sample_information.sample_id JOIN analysis_results ON sample_information.sample_id = analysis_results.sample_id;
SELECT * FROM experiments
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments
SELECT sample_name, sample_description FROM samples
SELECT analysis_date, analysis_report FROM analysis_results
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments ORDER BY experiment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM experiments;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT samples.sample_name, experiments.experiment_name FROM samples JOIN experiments ON samples.experiment_id = experiments.experiment_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_samples FROM samples;
SELECT analysis_report FROM analysis_results ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM experiments;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE researcher_name = 'John';
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM samples ORDER BY sample_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM sequencing_results LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM samples JOIN experiments ON samples.experiment_id = experiments.experiment_id WHERE experiments.experiment_name LIKE '%COVID%';
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date, analysis_method FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT annotations.annotation_id, annotations.annotation_type, sequencing_results.sequencing_date FROM annotations JOIN sequencing_results ON annotations.result_id = sequencing_results.result_id;
